Name: Mage Fort
About the game: Tower Defense meets magical action. Fire cat cannons. Build, repair, and upgrade your defenses. Master multiple mage classes. Mage Fort puts the focus on co-op action with a heavy defensive theme! Key Features Full Controller Support 1-4 Players Co-Op Build & upgrade Walls, Gates, Towers Cat Cannons Multiple Mage Classes
